biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a formidable competitor known for his calculated approach and unwavering focus on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Jarkko has become a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his exceptional course management.

With 8 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jarkko's experience is undeniable. His dedication and skill culminated in a triumphant victory at one of the past Hector Trophée tournaments, securing the coveted Hector Trophée title for his team. Moreover, Jarkko has demonstrated his individual prowess by claiming the Victor Trophy, awarded to the tournament's best individual player.

As Jarkko prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds. The question on everyone's mind is whether Jarkko's wealth of experience and unwavering determination will propel him and his partner to another remarkable triumph. The golfing world watches with bated breath.
